markdownRemark.excerpt: Check it out! I am a guest author for a three part blog series on getting Ghost 0.5.x running up in Azure cloud on the MSDN’s Canadian Developer Connection blog…
markdownRemark.html:
Check it out! I am a guest author for a three part blog series on getting Ghost 0.5.x running up in Azure cloud on the MSDN’s Canadian Developer Connection blog.

I’ll update this post as the rest of the parts are published, but check them out if you want to run an awesome NodeJS blog like me. :)

  • Part 1: Getting it Running Locally
  • Part 2: Customizing and Fixing your Deployment
  • Part 3: Adding and Deploying a Custom Theme from Source
  • Part 4: Protecting our Azure Blog with HTTPS

Thanks for playing! ~ DW

frontmatter.title: Ghost 0.5.X from Source to Azure Websites on Canadian Developer Connection
